name: Flintlock'd
description: On the island of Ballastpoint, join a ragtag group of pirates as they embark on a journey to uncover and stop the secret plot of the aristocracy's weapon of mass destruction, The Island Sinker. In this beat 'em up, use your crews various arsenal of attacks to combo your way through different levels. Harnessing the power of Gravitum, a gem imbued with the powers of gravity, unleash special abilities to leave enemies quaking in their boots.
